text: Dolianova (Patiòlla) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 9,699 people lived there. Its area is 84.31 km². It is 212 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Dolianova
